rules.ruleString: For COURSE_CODE IN {3387, L6005} Do Must have passed 72 credit points Otherwise true
Must be enrolled in course type {04, 05, 06, 06G, 06PG, 07G, 07PG, 50} owned by {50000567}

description: The unit analyses international commercial arbitration from an advanced practical and theoretical perspective, its sources of law and the ways in which it is integrated with domestic legal systems. Attention is given to the conduct of arbitrations, the elements of the Award, court supervision and enforcement. Specific attention is given to contractual disputes and also the emerging area of international investment disputes.
